TestApplication.cc

00001 #include "TestApplication.h"
00002 
00003 #include "BaseMacLayer.h"
00004 #include "NetwControlInfo.h"
00005 #include "ApplPkt_m.h"
00006 
00007 using std::endl;
00008 
00009 Define_Module(TestApplication);
00010 
00011 void TestApplication::initialize(int stage) {
00012     BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00013 
00014 
00015     if (stage == 0) {
00016         // begin by connecting the gates
00017         // to allow messages exchange
00018         dataOut = findGate("lowerLayerOut");
00019         dataIn = findGate("lowerLayerIn");
00020         ctrlOut = findGate("lowerControlOut");
00021         ctrlIn  = findGate("lowerControlIn");
00022 
00023 
00024         // Retrieve parameters
00025         debug = par("debug").boolValue();
00026         stats = par("stats").boolValue();
00027         trace = par("trace").boolValue();
00028 
00029         isTransmitting    = false;
00030 
00031         nbPackets         = par("nbPackets");
00032         trafficParam      = par("trafficParam").doubleValue();
00033         nodeAddr          = LAddress::L3Type( par("nodeAddr").longValue() );
00034         dstAddr           = LAddress::L3Type( par("dstAddr").longValue() );
00035         flood             = par("flood").boolValue();
00036         PAYLOAD_SIZE      = par("payloadSize"); // data field size
00037         PAYLOAD_SIZE      = PAYLOAD_SIZE * 8; // convert to bits
00038         // Configure internal state variables and objects
00039         nbPacketsReceived = 0;
00040         remainingPackets  = nbPackets;
00041 
00042         INITIAL_DELAY     = 5; // initial delay before sending first packet
00043 
00044         // start timer if needed
00045         if (nodeAddr != 0 && remainingPackets > 0) {
00046             delayTimer = new cMessage("app-delay-timer");
00047             scheduleAt(simTime() + INITIAL_DELAY +uniform(0,0.001), delayTimer); // we add a small shift to avoid systematic collisions
00048         } else {
00049             delayTimer = 0;
00050         }
00051 
00052         if (stats) {
00053             // we should collect statistics
00054             int nbNodes = getNode()->size();
00055             for (int i = 0; i < nbNodes; i++) {
00056                 std::ostringstream oss;
00057                 oss << "latency";
00058                 oss << i;
00059                 cStdDev aLatency(oss.str().c_str());
00060                 latencies.push_back(aLatency);
00061             }
00062         }
00063 
00064         if (trace) {
00065             // record all packet arrivals
00066             latenciesRaw.setName("rawLatencies");
00067         }
00068 
00069     }
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 TestApplication::~TestApplication() {
00074   if (delayTimer)
00075         cancelAndDelete(delayTimer);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void TestApplication::finish() {
00079 
00080     if (stats) {
00081         recordScalar("Packets received", nbPacketsReceived);
00082         recordScalar("Aggregate latency", testStat.getMean());
00083         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < latencies.size(); i++) {
00084             cStdDev aLatency = latencies[i];
00085             aLatency.record();
00086         }
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void TestApplication::handleMessage(cMessage * msg) {
00091   debugEV << "In TestApplication::handleMessage" << endl;
00092     if (msg == delayTimer) {
00093         if (debug) {
00094           debugEV << "  processing application timer." << endl;
00095         }
00096         if (! isTransmitting) {
00097       // create and send a new message
00098       ApplPkt* msg = new ApplPkt("SomeData");
00099       msg->setBitLength(PAYLOAD_SIZE);
00100       msg->setSrcAddr(nodeAddr);
00101       msg->setDestAddr(dstAddr);
00102       NetwControlInfo::setControlInfo(msg, dstAddr);
00103       if (debug) {
00104         debugEV << " sending down new data message to Aloha MAC layer for radio transmission." << endl;
00105       }
00106       send(msg, dataOut);
00107       isTransmitting = true;
00108       // update internal state
00109       remainingPackets--;
00110     }
00111         // reschedule timer if appropriate
00112         if (remainingPackets > 0) {
00113             if (!flood && !delayTimer->isScheduled()) {
00114                 scheduleAt(simTime() + exponential(trafficParam) + 0.001, delayTimer);
00115             }
00116         } else {
00117             cancelAndDelete(delayTimer);
00118             delayTimer = 0;
00119         }
00120     } else if (msg->getArrivalGateId() == dataIn) {
00121         // we received a data message from someone else !
00122         ApplPkt* m = dynamic_cast<ApplPkt*>(msg);
00123         if (debug)
00124           debugEV << "I (" << nodeAddr << ") received a message from node "
00125                 << m->getSrcAddr() << " of size " << m->getBitLength() << "." << endl;
00126         nbPacketsReceived++;
00127 
00128         if (stats) {
00129             simtime_t theLatency = msg->getArrivalTime() - msg->getCreationTime();
00130             latencies[m->getSrcAddr()].collect(SIMTIME_DBL(theLatency));
00131             testStat.collect(SIMTIME_DBL(theLatency));
00132         }
00133 
00134         if (trace) {
00135             simtime_t theLatency = msg->getArrivalTime() - msg->getCreationTime();
00136             latenciesRaw.record(SIMTIME_DBL(theLatency));
00137         }
00138 
00139         delete msg;
00140     } else if (msg->getArrivalGateId() == ctrlIn) {
00141       debugEV << "Received a control message." << endl;
00142         // msg announces end of transmission.
00143         if (msg->getKind() ==BaseMacLayer::TX_OVER) {
00144           isTransmitting = false;
00145             if (remainingPackets > 0 && flood && !delayTimer->isScheduled()) {
00146                 scheduleAt(simTime() + 0.001*001 + uniform(0, 0.001*0.001), delayTimer);
00147             }
00148         }
00149         delete msg;
00150     } else {
00151         // default case
00152         if (debug) {
00153       ApplPkt* m = static_cast<ApplPkt*>(msg);
00154       debugEV << "I (" << nodeAddr << ") received a message from node "
00155           << (static_cast<ApplPkt*>(msg))->getSrcAddr() << " of size " << m->getBitLength() << "." << endl;
00156         }
00157         delete msg;
00158     }
00159 }
